languages.text: {n}Малгар задирает ствол на вас — и тут же опускает оружие. Его руки дрожат, а сквозь кровожадную маску проглядывается отчаяние и стыд.{/n} "Да как же, Ваш высокобродие... Как же вы так говорить можете..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Малгар задирает ствол на вас — и тут же опускает оружие. Его руки дрожат, а сквозь кровожадную маску проглядывается отчаяние и стыд.{/n} "Да как же, Ваш высокобродие... Как же вы так говорить можете..."

languages.text: {n}Malgar raises his gun at you, only to immediately lower it. His hands are shaking. Shame and despair are showing through his mask of bloodlust.{/n} "For crying out loud, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}... How could you say such a thing..."
languages.original_text: {n}Малгар задирает ствол на вас — и тут же опускает оружие. Его руки дрожат, а сквозь кровожадную маску проглядывается отчаяние и стыд.{/n} "Да как же, Ваш высокобродие... Как же вы так говорить можете..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgar raises his gun at you, only to lower it at once. His hands are shaking. Shame and despair are showing through his mask of bloodlust.{/n} "For crying out loud, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}... How can you say a thing like that..."

{n}Malgar raises his gun at you, only to lower it at once. His hands are shaking. Shame and despair are showing through his mask of bloodlust.{/n} "For crying out loud, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}... How can you say a thing like that..."

{n}Malgar raises his gun at you, only to immediately lower it. His hands are shaking. Shame and despair are showing through his mask of bloodlust.{/n} "For crying out loud, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}... How could you say such a thing..."

{n}Malgar raises his gun at you, only to immediately lower it. His hands are shaking. Shame and despair are showing through his mask of bloodlust.{/n} "For crying out loud, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}... How could you say such a thing..."

{n}Malgar raises his gun at you, only to immediately lower it. His hands are shaking. Shame and despair are showing through his mask of bloodlust.{/n} "For crying out loud, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}... How could you say such a thing..."

{n}Malgar raises his gun at you, only to immediately lower it. His hands are shaking. Shame and despair are showing through his mask of bloodlust.{/n} "For crying out loud, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}... How could you say such a thing..."

languages.text: {n}Malgar richtet seine Waffe auf dich, senkt sie aber sofort wieder. Seine Hände zittern. Scham und Verzweiflung blitzen unter seiner Maske des Blutrauschs auf.{/n} "Verflucht noch eins, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, {mf|Sir|Madam} ... Wie könnt Ihr so etwas sagen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Malgar raises his gun at you, only to immediately lower it. His hands are shaking. Shame and despair are showing through his mask of bloodlust.{/n} "For crying out loud, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}... How could you say such a thing..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgar richtet seine Waffe auf dich, senkt sie aber sofort wieder. Seine Hände zittern. Scham und Verzweiflung blitzen unter seiner Maske des Blutrauschs auf.{/n} "Verflucht noch eins, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, {mf|Sir|Madam} ... Wie könnt Ihr so etwas sagen ..."

languages.text: {n}Malgar lève son arme vers vous, puis l'abaisse immédiatement, les mains tremblantes. La honte et le désespoir transparaissent à travers son expression sanguinaire.{/n} « Pour l'amour du ciel... comment vous pouvez dire une chose pareille ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Malgar raises his gun at you, only to immediately lower it. His hands are shaking. Shame and despair are showing through his mask of bloodlust.{/n} "For crying out loud, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}... How could you say such a thing..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgar lève son arme vers vous, puis l'abaisse immédiatement, les mains tremblantes. La honte et le désespoir transparaissent à travers son expression sanguinaire.{/n} « Pour l'amour du ciel... comment vous pouvez dire une chose pareille ? »

languages.text: {n}马尔加举起枪，对准了你，但随即又放了下来。他的双手颤抖着，嗜血的脸上流露出羞愧与绝望的表情。{/n}“啊，天哪，大人，长官……您怎么能这么说……”
languages.original_text: {n}Malgar raises his gun at you, only to immediately lower it. His hands are shaking. Shame and despair are showing through his mask of bloodlust.{/n} "For crying out loud, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}... How could you say such a thing..."

traits.locale_text: {n}马尔加举起枪，对准了你，但随即又放了下来。他的双手颤抖着，嗜血的脸上流露出羞愧与绝望的表情。{/n}“啊，天哪，大人，长官……您怎么能这么说……”

languages.text: {n}マルガーは、あなたに向かって銃を構えるが、すぐに下ろす。その手は震えている。血に飢えた仮面の下に、恥と絶望が透けて見える。{/n}「まったく、閣下…よくもそんなことが言えたものだ…」
languages.original_text: {n}Malgar raises his gun at you, only to immediately lower it. His hands are shaking. Shame and despair are showing through his mask of bloodlust.{/n} "For crying out loud, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}... How could you say such a thing..."

traits.locale_text: {n}マルガーは、あなたに向かって銃を構えるが、すぐに下ろす。その手は震えている。血に飢えた仮面の下に、恥と絶望が透けて見える。{/n}「まったく、閣下…よくもそんなことが言えたものだ…」

languages.text: {n}Malgar levanta su arma hacia ti, solo para bajarla inmediatamente. Le tiemblan las manos. La vergüenza y la desesperación aparecen a través de su máscara de sed de sangre.{/n} «Madre mía, mi{mf|lord|lady}... Cómo puede decir eso...».
languages.original_text: {n}Malgar raises his gun at you, only to immediately lower it. His hands are shaking. Shame and despair are showing through his mask of bloodlust.{/n} "For crying out loud, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}... How could you say such a thing..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgar levanta su arma hacia ti, solo para bajarla inmediatamente. Le tiemblan las manos. La vergüenza y la desesperación aparecen a través de su máscara de sed de sangre.{/n} «Madre mía, mi{mf|lord|lady}... Cómo puede decir eso...».

languages.text: {n}Malgar, silahını önce sana doğru kaldırıyor ama hemen indiriyor. Elleri titriyor. Takındığı kana susamışlık maskesi ardından utancı ve umutsuzluğu okunuyor.{/n} "Yapmayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Böyle bir şeyi nasıl söylersiniz?"
languages.original_text: {n}Malgar raises his gun at you, only to immediately lower it. His hands are shaking. Shame and despair are showing through his mask of bloodlust.{/n} "For crying out loud, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}... How could you say such a thing..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgar silahını önce sana doğru kaldırıyor ama hemen indiriyor. Elleri titriyor. Utancı ve umutsuzluğu, kana susamışlık kisvesinden belli oluyor.{/n} "Yapmayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... Böyle bir şeyi nasıl söylersiniz?.."
